## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a41b3ce4e07bead732805aa365094d037}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code TextAPIError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/textapi/textapierror-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/textapi/textapierror-h">TextAPIError.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/textapi/textapierror-cpp/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/textapi/textapierror-cpp">TextAPIError.cpp</a>.
